sentences.en: " Let me see your license and registration, " Neri said.
sentences.cn: “ 让我看看你的执照和登记卡, ” 奈里说.

sentences.en: " Well, then, Wheeler, " he said. " I'll get the license this afternoon. "
sentences.cn: “ 那么, 好, 就用惠勒, " 他说, " 我今天下午就去领结婚证书.

sentences.en: He applied for a trading license.
sentences.cn: 他申请了一张营业执照.

sentences.en: Hunting without a license will land you in trouble.
sentences.cn: 无证狩猎将会使你陷入麻烦.

sentences.en: I assume we'll still continue our nuclear license applications.
sentences.cn: 我想我们也要加紧办理我们的核电站许可申请.

sentences.en: If it doesn't pass muster, a radio station could have its license challenged.
sentences.cn: 如果不合要求，电台可能会被吊销执照。

sentences.en: Interface that you implement to handle result of the license check.
sentences.cn: 您可以通过实现这个接口来处理许可检查的结果。

sentences.en: Mary and John took out a marriage license.
sentences.cn: 玛丽和约翰取得一份结婚证书.

sentences.en: No special license will be regranted to anyone from now on.
sentences.cn: 特殊许可证今后不得向任何人再行发放。

sentences.en: Please advise us immediately after you have obtained the necessary import license.
sentences.cn: 你公司得到所需进口许可证后,请立即通知我们.

sentences.en: Remind me to renew the driver's license.It will lapse next month.
sentences.cn: 提醒我更换驾驶执照，它下个月就失效了。

sentences.en: Samuel Langhorne Clemens earned his steamboat pilot's license.
sentences.cn: 塞缪尔·朗荷恩·克列门斯拿到了轮船舵手执照.

sentences.en: Since you have no license, you are not allowed to drive.
sentences.cn: 因为你没有驾驶执照，所以不允许你开车。

sentences.en: The dealers applied for an export license.
sentences.cn: 经销商申请了出口许可证。

sentences.en: The driver was arrested for having false license plates on his car.
sentences.cn: 司机由于使用假车牌而被捕.

sentences.en: The foreign guest has a license on the person.
sentences.cn: 这个外国客人随身携带执照.

sentences.en: The invading troops displayed the most unbridled license.
sentences.cn: 入侵军队胡作非为到了极点.

sentences.en: The next time the client connects to the server, it will obtain another license.
sentences.cn: 在客户端下一次连接到服务器时，它将获得另一个许可证。

sentences.en: The vaccine has been licensed by the US Food and Drug Administration.
sentences.cn: 这种疫苗已经得到美国食品与药物管理局的批准。

sentences.en: To help lower costs, IBM offers flexible virtualization license costs, where you pay only for the number of virtual resources that you have deployed.
sentences.cn: 为了帮助降低成本，IBM 提供灵活的虚拟化许可证费用机制，您只需根据已经部署的虚拟资源数量付费。

sentences.en: Two policemen held up a truck so as to inspect the driver's license.
sentences.cn: 两个警察让一辆卡车停住以便检查司机的驾驶证.

sentences.en: We are handling the work license for you.
sentences.cn: 我们正在为你办理工作执照.

sentences.en: You must obtain a new automobile license when your old one expires.
sentences.cn: 当旧的汽车牌照满期,你得领取新的.

words.tran_cn: 得到许可的；领有执照的
持牌人；执照持有者；获许可的人；领到执照的人
许可（licence的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: an official document giving you permission to own or do something for a period of time
an official document giving you permission to own or do something for a period of time
to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place
to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place
